content.question: A force <math alttext="F" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>F</mi></math> that varies with time <math alttext="t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi></math> is exerted on an object. The force is described by the equation <math alttext="F of t equals, F sub 0, end sub, e raised to the negative b t power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>F</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>t</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><msup><mi>e</mi><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>b</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></msup></math> where <math alttext="F sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math> and <math alttext="b" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>b</mi></math> are positive constants. If the object is at rest at time <math alttext="t equals 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>, the momentum of the object a very long time later is most nearly

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction F sub 0 over b" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mi>b</mi></mfrac></math>
<math alttext="the negative of the fraction F sub 0 over b" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mpadded><mo>-</mo><mfrac><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mi>b</mi></mfrac></mpadded></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction F sub 0 over b" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mi>b</mi></mfrac></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
